head.title: Arts, Briefly; New Leader for Makeover Of Lincoln Center

hedline.hl1: Arts, Briefly; New Leader for Makeover Of Lincoln Center

body.head.byline: By ROBIN POGREBIN; Compiled by Lawrence Van Gelder

block.p: Lincoln Center named a new executive director of its development project yesterday. Beginning May 8, Ron Austin, a construction management specialist, will oversee the transformation of the campus, currently under way. Mr. Austin replaces Jerry Hastings, who resigned last month after less than a year in the job. As president of Vital Management Solutions, Mr. Austin has handled projects including the completion of construction on the Carnival Center for the Performing Arts in Miami.
